text: Rat Island may refer to: *Hawadax Island, Alaska, USA, formerly known as "Rat Island" *Rat Island, New York, USA *Rat Island (Western Australia), an island in Western Australia *An alternative name for Burrow Island in Portsmouth Harbour, Hampshire, England *Motukiore, Bay of Islands, New Zealand *Rat Island, Lundy, a small island near the south end of Lundy, Devon, England *Rat Island: a small island west of Bengkulu (19th Century name) *Rat Island, St Lucia ==See also== * Rat Islands
title: Rat Island
